about_the_game:
Welcome to your new gay gym! Train hard, flirt hard . . . slay monsters hard?! GymBeasts is a gay visual novel with a mysterious portal behind your squat rack.

All you wanted was to survive your first workout in your new gay gym and flirt a bit with the sexy gym goers. But suddenly everything changes: your lasagna-in-front-of-the-TV-evening is canceled! You will have to travel to another medieval dimension with your new friends, experience a huge adventure and maybe save the day? It's your choice: Will you fight monsters with the strongest guy in the gym, solve a giant mystery with the empathetic youngster, or derail EVERYTHING with the unfriendly hottie? But your biggest worry is whether there'll be time for dating!

Features

  • Three gym guys each with their own hot adventures and exhausting dates (or is it the other way round?)
  • Two dimensions to visit: a modern-day gym and a medieval fantasy world
  • Multiple endings per guy
  • Hours of funny and thrilling story and dialog
  • Just one more rep gets a whole new meaning here

content_descriptors.notes: GymBeasts contains strong language, fantasy violence, blood and some gore, as well as nudity and sexual material.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu / SteamOS
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 172 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6-10.14
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 172 MB available space

name: GymBeasts

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 172 MB available space
